DOC.brief_summary: Ulcerative Colitis Inflammatory Bowel disease life-long , relapse disable disorder . Current treatment Ulcerative Colitis satisfactory . Most medication provide partial relief , successful least 30 % patient , major negative side effect . Mounting evidence indicate stress one important trigger activate symptom ulcerative colitis therefore cause flare-up . The primary aim study see either two 8-week Mind-Body course effect reduce stress affect course severity UC . Hypotheses : Stress cause Ulcerative Colitis flare-up stress reduction prevent Ulcerative Colitis flare-up .
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : We enroll 100 subject Phase I/IIa randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial . Subjects assign one two Mind/Body course , hold week 8 consecutive week . Each class last 1.5-2 hour .
